examples.full_description: Artist can be initialized
Artist can have a name
Artist has many songs
Artist can have many genres
Artist can slugify its name

exception.message: undefined method `slug' for #<Artist id: 1, name: "Taylor Swift">

examples.description: given the slug can find an Artist
examples.full_description: Artist Class methods given the slug can find an Artist

exception.message:
undefined method `find_by_slug' for Artist(id: integer, name: string):Class
Did you mean?  find_by_sql
